entities.name: ginnys hair
entities.description: Ginny's hair flew as she pulled her arm out of her mother's grip.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny was struggling with Mrs. Weasley and argued that she was in Dumbledore's Army.

entities.name: dumbledore's army
entities.description: Ginny mentioned that she was part of Dumbledore's Army, a teenagers' gang.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred defended Ginny and said that the teenagers' gang was about to take on Harry.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George looked slightly ashamed of himself for bringing Ginny with him.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill gently told Ginny that she couldn't participate in the battle because she was underage.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur stood around with Lupin, Fred, George, Bill, and Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin stood around with Fleur, Fred, George, Bill, and Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley struggled with Ginny and argued that she was underage and shouldn't be there.

relationships.description: Ginny mentioned that she was part of Dumbledore's Army, a teenagers' gang.
Fred defended Ginny and said that the teenagers' gang was about to take on Harry.
George looked slightly ashamed of himself for bringing Ginny with him.
Bill gently told Ginny that she couldn't participate in the battle because she was underage.
